entry.string: You must add an Newsletter user before creating a publication. Please go to Admin -> Newsletter -> Add Newsletter User.
entry.translation: Yuoo moost edd un Noosletter user beffure-a creeteeng a poobleeceshun. Pleese-a gu tu Edmeen -> Noosletter -> Edd Noosletter User. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!

entry.string: You must create categories under the Newsletter category before creating a publication.
entry.translation: Yuoo moost creete-a cetegureees under zee Noosletter cetegury beffure-a creeteeng a poobleeceshun.
